attributes.additional_details: This is my home too and the the other 7.5 billion humans as well as the billions of other lives on this planet we call animals. Without them we cannot survive, so buy stopping the production of virgin plastics, it will help our fight against the climate change catastrophe.
attributes.background: We need to stop the production of plastics immediately. As a government I want you to help our environments and help by stopping the production of virgin plastics. I want a future for future generations to have a habitable place to live.
